title: question about box
body: so, this season, season 7, why is my highest grade with lee sin s, i remembe playing that game, but still havent aquired box for him, ad iv gotten multiple s and s- with him so far

replies.body: Do you have a box available to earn? You get one every week and they stack up to four available. You can see if you have a box available on your profile page.
yes i had boxes available, also had a box available when i got s with ashe and got none, but then they gave me one for the s i got for ryze after that

**You can only earn a chest:**

**- If you have one available on your profile** (which you did)
**- Once per champion per season** (you said you hadn't earned one for him but until recently the anims weren't properly in the new client for earning chests so you may have gotten one and not noticed. Does he have a little gold border around him when you look at your champions?)
**- If you or someone in your premade earns the S grade** (which you did)
**- If you are not currently loot restricted** (which you aren't)
**- If you own the champion you played** (Lee hasn't been on ftp rotation so I imagine you do)

Unless I'm forgetting one, these are all the requirements for earning a chest, any of them fit?

oh, sorry i had logged out of the website, its alright, i had had a box available to earn ad with lee, but its fine, i just got a random box given about a week after this post, i guess it was a glitch ad it had caught up, thanks anyway
